message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_METADATA_FV_EVIDENCE_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: An evidence type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_METADATA_FV_VIEW_PAGE_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The view page name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_METADATA_FV_MODIFY_PAGE_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The modify page name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_METADATA_RV_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot modify this record as it has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_METADATA_RV_RECORD_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot cancel this record as it has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_METADATA_XRV_ACTIVE_EVIDENCE_CURRENTLY_EXISTS
message.locale: Active evidence of type %1s with effective date %2c currently exists.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_METADATA_FV_DATE_IN_PAST
message.locale: The Effective From date cannot be in the past.

message.name: ERR_CASE_TYPE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The case type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_METADATA_FV_WZ_CREATE_PAGE_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Please enter the Auto End Dating Wizardâ€™s Page Name.
